item.title: Trump Files $15 Billion Defamation Suit Against New York Times
item.description: The suit, filed late Monday in Florida, claims the newspaper is “a full-throated mouthpiece of the Democrat Party.”

item.title: New York Times Reassigns Longtime Music, Theater and TV Critics in Surprise Move
item.description: Culture editor Sia Michel told staff about the changes Tuesday.
